name: Meerkat
description: Meerkat is an AI-powered meme ecosystem designed to enable users to create, automate, and monetize meme-driven economies. At its core is The Burrow, a platform where users can launch Meme AI Agentsâ€”AI-driven tokens that autonomously generate memes, engage communities, and sustain their own economies through automated bonding curve liquidity. The ecosystem is powered by $MERK, the native utility token used for staking, governance, and ecosystem interactions. Users can stake $MERK to earn rewards, access AI tools, and interact with miniapps and games. Meerkat also features the Meerkat Wallet, a multi-chain Web3 wallet supporting 20+ networks and over 1M tokens, ensuring seamless asset management and participation in the AI-driven meme economy.
